description.en:
Mad World Defi is an ecosystem built around a Play to Earn MMO in the spirit of Club Penguin and Habbo Hotel. Using your own Mad Lad NFT as your Avatar you gain access to the Biggest Social-Hub, Play-To-Earn MMO in DeFi.

Become the MAD SCIENTIST of your own customizable MAD LAB! Play with friends, challenge them to PvP and leaderboard single-player games, apply for NFT-backed loans in the Mad World Treasury, build your own clan houses and explore a whole new DeFi ecosystem! 

MadCredits (MWD) act as the currency for this unique ecosystem and is tied into everything from NFTs that give reflection to how you transact and are rewarded within this play to earn virtual world.
